tag.description: Register a PanelToggleListener instance on the UIComponent associated with the closest parent UIComponent custom action.

attribute.description: Fully qualified Java class name of a PanelToggleListener to be created and registered.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Value binding expression that evaluates to an object that implements org.richfaces.event.PanelToggleListener.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: If present, this attribute refers to the value of one of the exposed attached objects within the composite component inside of which this tag is nested.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: I don't know maybe some thing strange
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: If present, this attribute refers to the value of one of the exposed attached objects within the composite component inside of which this tag is nested.
attribute.name: for
